result.pre: Ae. aegypti is the major vector of ZIKV. Author summary
result.post: virus (ZIKV) is a mosquito-borne pathogen that generally causes

result.pre: microcephaly. In adults, it can cause Guillain-Barré syndrome. The recent
result.post: epidemic in the Americas has been linked to the

result.pre: of Australian Ae. aegypti and Ae. albopictus mosquitoes for a
result.post: epidemic strain, originating from the epicentre of the Brazilian

result.pre: Our results demonstrate that, although both species were susceptible to
result.post: infection, Ae. aegypti is more likely to transmit virus.

result.pre: and its Supporting Information files. Introduction Over the past decade,
